name: Organic applesauce
description: We use only apples from controlled organic cultivation for our organic applesauce. The applesauce is then put into the jar without added sugar or other preservatives.

name: Original Barbecue Sauce
description: Organic BBQ Sauce has a smoky flavor made with organic apple cider vinegar, Dijon mustard and more. Delicious with steak, hamburgers, ribs, chicken or fish. An ideal marinade and great for dipping.

name: Gluten Free Cranberry Bar
description: This bar made with sweet tangy cranberries and mellow almonds turned out to be one of our most popular all-time flavors.

name: Organic chocolate, 85% dark
description: E dark, floral Chocolates, made from rare Nacional Arrriba cocoa from Ecuador and preserving the biodiverse ecosystem of the Chocó rainforest in Esmeraldas province.

name: Oragnic Peach Jam
description: Bursting with juicy, sun-ripened peaches, this special jam has a homemade quality.

name: Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil
description: Our Olive Oil blend is made with olives harvested early in the season in the mountainous natural park areas of Andalusia, Spain.

name: Organic Peanut Butter
description: All-natural peanut butter made with our special blend of perfectly roasted peanuts and just a tiny bit of salt, that’s it.

name: Bio Marinara Sauce
description: Organic diced tomatoes in organic tomato juice, organic basil, sea salt, organic dried onions, organic dried garlic, organic dried oregano.

name: Honey Comb
description: Foraged from flowers by busy bees, this is honey in its rawest, purest form.

name: Bio Ketchup
description: Full of the classic taste you remember, tidied up with high-quality ingredients.

name: Organic Olive Soap
description: Cleanse & moisturize naturally with this traditionally crafted, 86% Pure Olive Oil soap - perfect for all skin types.

name: Organic Honey
description: Delicate fruity taste and mild tangy finish. This rare honey is perfect for anything you use honey for like drizzling on fruit and yogurt and in herbal and green teas.

name: Dry Mushrooms
description: The organic certified high-quality Dried Mixed Wild Mushrooms have a powerful aroma and fruity & earthy flavour.

name: Organic Sesame Tahini
description: Our tahini is made only with the finest selected sesame seeds. These are roasted and stone ground to obtain a delectable and creamy texture.

name: Organic, Strawberry Jam
description: The main ingredient in this peachy-pink spread is organic strawberries, ensuring it has the sunbaked flavor of a ripe, summer’s day.

name: Organic Black Olive Spread
description: The olive paste combines the finest Kalamata olives with high-quality olive oil and selected spices.

name: Oat Cookies
description: Oat cookies are the absolute classic in the biscuit game. What tastes better than crispy, sweet cereal biscuits?

name: Organic Saffron
description: This saffron of the highest quality and aromatic is grown, processed and packed in the La Mancha region of Spain.

name: Gluten Free Granola
description: This is a granola made by methods and practices worthy of an explanation. What makes it so special? The whole grain oats we use in this granola are gluten free.

name: Pickled Cucumbers Organic
description: Delicious organic picked cucumbers like no other. Packed full of a secret combo ingredients such as dill, chilli and more.
